extendedInfo.description: Ever wanted to set up a tournament with your friends but can never decide how to schedule the matches?  Quick Tournament Maker strives to take away the hassle of deciding by creating the schedule for you, whether by Elimination (AKA Brackets) or Round Robin. Features:1) Quick StartUse numbers to reference each player or team for your tournaments.  This will save you time by skipping the task of adding every player (or team) name into the database. 2) Full StartUse inputted names for your tournaments.  This will save you the hassle of reassigning numbers and remembering who they reference.3) Elimination (Bracket)Also known as bracket style tournament, each player or team will be pitted against another.  The winners of that round will face each other etc. until a winner emerges.  When the number of players (or teams) is odd or not a power of 2, an empty slot will occur (AKA "Bye") where the other player or team will automatically be the winner.4) Round RobinEach player or team will take turn facing each other exactly once.  An empty slot (AKA "Bye") will be used if there are an odd number of players or teams.  You can decide whether he, she or they who faces the "Bye"; should get a win or not.                5) Save and Load previous tournamentsYou can also save and reload your tournaments whenever you want. The custom tournament title, number of players and most recent time you saved will be recordedFull Version:1) Double Elimination style tournament.2) Custom ordering of players/teams for first round.3) Grouping of players/teams during selection and management.------------------Please add "Quick Tournament Maker Lite: " at the beginning of your subject line when emailing me.  Please also report bugs through emails so that we may converse in more details.

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: The principles are good, but the only. My GS2 the brackets don\'t adjust to the names. They slice it down the middle hightwise making it hard to see the names.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: Would be even better if it put in byes to make up numbers  so that no one gets byes in the semis or second rounds or even the possibility of prelims to save putting byes in
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Great app!  I found it just before running a blind draw/luck of the draw mini dart tournament.  It saved a lot of hassle.  In a larger tournament, it would be VERY helpful to have Quick Team Picker combined with it, or be able to export from that and import to Quick Tournament... Otherwise, you would have to write all the names twice which would be a big hassle if there are more than a few people/teams.  Great work, Andrew!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Best so far. I would like to have double elimination though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on ICS
reviews.comment: Transformer prime with latest ICS. I can enter team names but the menu button does not respond. Will check back b/c this looks like a very handy app!
